description:
Double down on cold-weather protection. This combo provides an waterproof shell and zip-out fleece jacket to wear on its own for transitional days. The shell has taped seams to handle seriously wet weather and the 3-panel hood that stays in place when deployed The zip out jacket is deep-file fleece in the chest, with shelled, insulated arms for warmth when worn solo. Between the technical materials and interchangeable layers, there is no weather condition that this 4-in-1 jacket isn’t prepared for.

  • Shell is waterproof-breathable, 2-layer H2No® Performance Standard polyester that's 50% recycled
  • Shell hood and sleeves are lined in 100% recycled polyester taffeta
  • Shell uses H2No® barrier for formidable protection from wet and windy weather
  • Hood has a 3-panel construction and internal elastic to keep it in place
  • Full-length waterproof zipper with internal storm flap
  • Zip-out jacket is lined, high-pile fleece with recycled polyester taffeta sleeves, both with a DWR treatment
  • Zip-out jacket has 60g Thermolite Eco92 insulation through the sleeves
  • Collar is lined with brushed polyester jersey for softness on the jaw
  • Shell has 1 zippered chest pocket and 2 zippered handwarmer pockets with reflective webbing pulls
  • Adjustable hook-and-loop closure at both sets of sleeve openings to seal out snow and cold
name: Patagonia 4-in-1 Everyday Jacket - Boys' - Youths
